title: Navratan Floral Pendant - A Timeless Treasure
materials: Polki Diamonds (Uncut Diamonds). Features exquisite Hyderabadi Polish for a rich
features: This captivating pendant boasts a traditional floral design, meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans. The central Tanzanite gemstone is surrounded by a halo of Polki diamonds in an open setting, enhancing its natural brilliance. Delicate freshwater pearl clusters are artfully arranged below. The top showcases a rose quartz cabochon encircled by more polki diamonds. This creation evokes the traditional 'Navratna' style, blending classic motifs with contemporary elegance. It can be worn as a pendant on the necklace.
colors: The color palette is a harmonious blend of pastel shades with rose quartz
and green amethyst. The warm yellow gold complements the gemstones beautifully
creating a rich and inviting aesthetic.
occasions: Perfect for a variety of special occasions
and family gatherings. Its timeless design makes it equally suitable for contemporary parties and formal events.
description: This pendant is a testament to exceptional craftsmanship and artistry. The use of high-quality gemstones and the meticulous Hyderabadi polish ensure its durability and lasting beauty. The traditional floral design holds cultural significance, making it a cherished heirloom for generations. The Navratan style is known for its auspiciousness and positive energy.
